- geologist, husband, father, sailor, ...
- interests in earth dymamics, energetics and landscapes 
- travelled and worked in many remote regions (inc. Antarctica, Tibet, Timor, many parts of remote Australia) 
- a privilege to have work among communities that have lived for millennia in some of the most dynamic parts of our planet.
- Redmond Barry Distinguished Professor (emeritus) at the University of Melbourne
- fellow of the Australian Academy of Science 
- regular contributor to popular press on geological and energy issues
